entry.title: Sunday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 14. POP 30%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy with 30 percent chance of flurries. Wind west 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming light this evening. Low minus 14. Wind chill minus 5 this evening and minus 20 overnight. Forecast issued 6:42 PM EDT Sunday 19 March 2023

entry.title: Monday: Chance of flurries. High minus 1. POP 30%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. 30 percent chance of flurries early in the morning. Clearing in the morning. Wind up to 15 km/h. High minus 1. Wind chill minus 19 in the morning and minus 3 in the afternoon. UV index 4 or moderate. Forecast issued 6:42 PM EDT Sunday 19 March 2023
